TestSuite: Fetch Cases for unmatched Merchant images

TC_01.TestCaseName: TC_01 It should fetch all the records of unmatched merchant images when valid caseNumber is passed as an argument @Smoke @Sanity @Regression @ServiceCaseDataAPI

TC_02.TestCaseName: TC_02 It should fetch all the records of unmatched merchant images when valid merchantNumber is passed as an argument @Regression @ServiceCaseDataAPI

TC_03.TestCaseName: TC_03 It should fetch all the records of unmatched merchant images when valid caseNumber  and valid acqReferenceNumber are passed as an argument @Regression @ServiceCaseDataAPI

TC_04.TestCaseName: TC_04 It should fetch all the records of unmatched merchant images when valid caseNumber and transactionAmount are passed as an argument @Regression @ServiceCaseDataAPI

TC_05.TestCaseName: TC_05 It should fetch all the records of unmatched merchant images when valid caseNumber and merchantNumber are passed as an argument @Regression @ServiceCaseDataAPI

TC_06.TestCaseName: TC_06 It should fetch all the records of unmatched merchant images when valid caseNumber ,valid acqReferenceNumber,valid transactionAmount are passed as an argument  @Regression @ServiceCaseDataAPI

TC_07.TestCaseName: TC_07 It should fetch all the records of unmatched merchant images when valid caseNumber valid acqReferenceNumber, valid merchantNumber are passed as an argument @Regression @ServiceCaseDataAPI

TC_08.TestCaseName: TC_08 It should fetch all the records of unmatched merchant images when valid caseNumber is passed as an argument @Regression @ServiceCaseDataAPI

TC_09.TestCaseName: TC_09 It should fetch all the records of unmatched merchant images when valid caseNumber ,valid acqReferenceNumber,valid transactionAmount,valid merchantNumber, valid firstSixcardNumber, valid lastFourCardNumber are passed as an argument @Regression @ServiceCaseDataAPI

TC_10.TestCaseName: TC_10 It should not  fetch the records of unmatched merchant images when Invalid caseNumber is passed as an argument @Regression @ServiceCaseDataAPI

TC_11.TestCaseName: TC_11 It should not  fetch the records of unmatched merchant images when Invalid acqReferenceNumber is passed as an argument @Regression @ServiceCaseDataAPI

TC_12.TestCaseName: TC_12 It should not  fetch the records of unmatched merchant images when Invalid transactionAmount is passed as an argument @Regression @ServiceCaseDataAPI

TC_13.TestCaseName: TC_13 It should not  fetch the records of unmatched merchant images when Invalid merchantNumber is passed as an argument @Regression @ServiceCaseDataAPI

TC_14.TestCaseName: TC_14 It should fetch all the records of unmatched Scheme images when valid merchantNumber and valid cardBrandCaseNumber is passed as an argument  @Regression @ServiceCaseDataAPI

TC_15.TestCaseName: TC_15 It should fetch all the records of unmatched Scheme images when valid firstSixcardNumber and valid merchantNumber is passed as an argument @Regression @ServiceCaseDataAPI

TC_16.TestCaseName: TC_16 It should fetch all the records of unmatched Scheme images when valid lastFourCardNumber and valid merchantNumber is passed as an argument @Regression @ServiceCaseDataAPI

TC_17.TestCaseName: TC_17 It should fetch all the records of unmatched Scheme images when valid acqReferenceNumber and valid merchantNumber is passed as an argument @Regression @ServiceCaseDataAPI

TC_18.TestCaseName: TC_18 It should fetch all the records of unmatched Scheme images when valid acqReferenceNumber, valid firstSixcardNumber, valid lastFourCardNumber and valid merchantNumber is passed as an argument @Regression @ServiceCaseDataAPI

TC_19.TestCaseName: TC_19 It should throw 404 status code for unmatched Scheme images when Invalid cardBrandCaseNumber is passed as an argument @Regression @ServiceCaseDataAPI

TC_20.TestCaseName: TC_20 Itshould throw 404 status code for  unmatched Scheme images when valid acqReferenceNumber and Invalid merchantNumber is passed as an argument @Regression @ServiceCaseDataAPI
